devdoc.author: Daichotomy team
devdoc.details: Check out all this sweet code!

GetDaiPriceUSD().details: this function get the DAI/USD price by getting the price of ETH/USD from Maker medianizer and dividing it by the price of ETH/DAI from Uniswap.
GetDaiPriceUSD().return: relativePrice of DAI with regards to USD peg, where 1:1 == 1e18

params._daiDeposit: the total amount of underlying to deposit (UP/DOWN DAI = _daiDeposit/2)

getETHCollateralRequirements(uint256).return: the amount of ETH needed for UPDAI pool and DOWNDAI pool

redeem(uint256).details: this function can be called before the settlement date, an equal amount of UPDAI and DOWNDAI should be deposited

params._redeemAmount: Pair count where 1 real token == 1e18 base units

redeemFinal().details: this function can only be called after contract settlement

devdoc.title: CFD - take a 20x leveraged position on the future price of DAI.. or provide liquidity to the market and earn staking rewards. Liquidation prices at 20x are 0.95<>1.05

GetETHUSDPriceFromMedianizer().notice: Parses the bytes32 price from Makers Medianizer into uint

_getCurrentDaiRates(uint256).notice: Based on the price of DAI, what are the current exchange rates for upDai and downDai?

claimRewards().notice: Claims all rewards that a staker is eligable for

getETHCollateralRequirements(uint256).notice: get the amount of ETH required to create a uniswap exchange

mint(uint256).notice: mint UP and DOWN DAI tokens

redeem(uint256).notice: redeem a pair of UPDAI and DOWNDAI
